responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "B741DB3E491F9EB61621C7ADF1B17258", "In my study of the gods, I have uncovered some forbidden magic placed upon slain members of the 3rd Lance Army. I\'m not completely sure who is behind this, though some suspect it\'s goblin magic as they seem to often tinker with blasphemous magic. The only way to prevent these soldiers from rising again is to purge bones of vile magic with a holy purification rite. Doing so will free them from this unending torment and allow them to rest with dignity.")
name: DialogueResponse_6064631601613307912
